Title: Authorizes local governments to opt out of mandates and benchmarks arising under the climate leadership and community protection act and associated universal electrification requirements
Summary: Authorizes local governments to opt out of mandates and benchmarks arising under the climate leadership and community protection act and associated universal electrification requirements by filing a resolution with the department of environmental conservation.
LawCode: Add ยง75-0121, En Con L; add ยง8-a, Pub Serv L; add ยง11-104-a, Energy L; amd ยง378, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, the public service law, the energy law and the executive law, in relation to authorizing local governments to opt out of mandates and benchmarks arising under the climate leadership and community protection act and associated universal electrification requirements
